messages.subject: words of wisdom needed
messages.msgSnippet: I have a little project underway which will eventually end up as part of what NHEN (National Home Education Network) will offer for new homeschoolers. I would
messages.messageBody:
I have a little project underway which will eventually end up as part of what
NHEN (National Home Education Network) will offer for new homeschoolers. I
would like a very very large number of short blurbs - words of advice from
experienced homeschoolers for those just getting started.

I need a few lines or a paragraph (if you want to write more, we'll call it
an article and be THRILLED to have it, too) in which you tell a new
homeschooler something you consider valuable for them to hear as they get
started on their homeschooling adventure.

If there is anything you'd like to write an article about - related to new
homeschoolers, please let me know.

We'll use your full name or only your first name and state, if you prefer.

Send responses to me, please.

Thanks,
Pam
PSoroosh@...
